Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChequingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public abstract class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this Class is to define required information that every Bank Account must contain. Adds formatted information required for every Bank Account created. Performs deposit and withdraw transactions on created Bank Accounts. Performs monthly account updates on a specific Bank Account. Prints properly formatted bank account information to an output file.
    Since:
    JDK 1.8
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Patrick Czermak

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Client accHolder
      protected Person variable accHolder has predefined parameters in class Person (firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, emailAddress).
      protected long accountNumber
      protected variable accountNumber holds the account number of a Bank Account.
      protected double balance
      protected double variable balance holds an accounts balance.
      protected java.text.DecimalFormat decForm
      protected DecimalFormat variable decForm is used to format all number values for display within classes BankAccount, SavingsAccount, and ChequingAccount.

    • Field Detail

      • accountNumber

        protected long accountNumber
        protected variable accountNumber holds the account number of a Bank Account. Must be a positive, unique number not greater than 8 numbers long.

      • accHolder

        protected Client accHolder
        protected Person variable accHolder has predefined parameters in class Person (firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, emailAddress).

      • balance

        protected double balance
        protected double variable balance holds an accounts balance. Must be a positive number.

      • decForm

        protected java.text.DecimalFormat decForm
        protected DecimalFormat variable decForm is used to format all number values for display within classes BankAccount, SavingsAccount, and ChequingAccount.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount()
        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method toString returns data of the account formatted to display. This method is overridden by its subclasses SavingsAccount and ChequingAccount. Combined they display the full required information of an account.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        stringMsg the properly formatted information all Bank Accounts must have.

      • outputString

        public java.lang.String outputString()
        Method outputString displays to an output text file. Displays the specific information required for every Bank Account.
        Returns:
        stringMsg is the Bank Account information read from the "bankinput.txt" file.

      • deposit

        public java.lang.String deposit(double amount)
        deposit method adds user inputed amount to account balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - user inputed double value which must be positive.
        Returns:
        depositMessage when deposit amount successfully deposited into an account

      • withdraw

        public java.lang.String withdraw(double amount)
        withdraw method subtracts user inputed amount from account balance.
        Parameters:
        amount - user inputed double value which must be positive.
        Returns:
        withdrawMessage either successful or unsuccessful message

      • monthlyAccountUpdate

        public abstract java.lang.String monthlyAccountUpdate()
        Abstract method monthlyAccountUpdate utilizes the overridden subclasses monthlyAccountUpdate methods to update either a Savings or Chequing account.
        Returns:
        message either successful or unsuccessful updates performed on Savings or Chequing accounts pop-up window
